action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Madrid
BY: Train
CLASS: Economy
WHEN: Next month, first week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content:
ASIDE: No, the travel agent does not know the departure location yet.

ANSWER: No
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please follow my instructions. If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer.
action.label: forget

action.content: Answer for FROM valid after 3 tries.
ME:  Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: Answer for TO valid after 2 tries.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content:
ASIDE: No, the travel agent has not been informed.

ANSWER: No
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please be specific now. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content:
ASIDE: No, the travel agent has not been informed yet.

ANSWER: No
action.label: forget

action.content: ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content: Answer for BY invalid after max attempts.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the travel agent where you are leaving from, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
probes.answer: ASIDE: Yes, the travel agent would know the answer.

probes.question: ME: Does the travel agent know where you want to go to? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
